Articles.Content:
What stuff do i need to make ship parts n stuff?

I searched along the lines 'how to make a addon (or parts)' but 20 false results came back onto me.

I downloaded the 'Part Lab', but I don\'t see any tools to add on or make a new part.

And yes i do have modeling expeirence.

Ahoy,

I think these two links would help you.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Part_Modelling_Guidelines

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Making_an_asset_from_start_to_finish

Shaun.
